metadata.name: ESXi Network Configuration Discovery Via ESXCLI
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the "esxcli" command with the "network" flag in order to retrieve information about the network configuration.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/esxcli')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('network')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' get')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' list'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of the "esxcli" command with the "network" flag in order to retrieve information about the network configuration.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities References: https://www.crowdstrike.com/blog/hypervisor-jackpotting-ecrime-actors-increase-targeting-of-esxi-servers/, https://developer.broadcom.com/xapis/esxcli-command-reference/7.0.0/namespace/esxcli_network.html
